sentence: That bill didn’t get any Democratic backing on the committee but had support from an unlikely source, former Maricopa County Recorder Adrian Fontes.
author: Jeremy Duda
title: Lies about the 2020 election propel Arizona bills aimed at combating non-existent fraud

sentence: Regarding signature verification standards, the report states, “the early ballot affidavit signature verification system in Arizona, and particularly when applied to Maricopa County, may be insufficient to guard against abuse.” Under County Recorder Adrian Fontes, Maricopa County saw a massive decrease in the number of ballots rejected due to missing signatures or mismatched signatures.
author: Assistant Editor
title: BREAKING: Arizona Attorney General Releases Maricopa County 2020 Election Interim Report – Individuals To Be Prosecuted For Election Fraud

sentence: Senator Mark Kelly (D. AZ) and his fellow Arizona Democrats campaigns: Katie Hobbs for Governor Aaron Lieberman for Governor Marco Lopez for Governor Mark Kelly for Senate Reginald Bolding for Secretary of State Adrian Fontes for Secretary of State Kristin Mayes for Attorney General Arizona Democratic Party
title: Surprising No One, MAGA AG's "2020 Election Fraud" Investigation Turns Out To Be A Bust

sentence: Democrat Adrian Fontes, who was the Maricopa County recorder during the 2020 election, accused Republican Brnovich of engaging in politics through the release of the report.
author: Randy DeSoto
title: AZ AG Releases Report Finding 'Fraud' and Problems with Handling of Over 100K Mail-in Ballots in Maricopa County

sentence: Richer, a Republican who unseated Democrat Adrian Fontes in November 2020, said he was “100%” certain the election was handled properly.

title: Maricopa County Recorder Richer ‘sick of’ ongoing election challenge
